name: Load Agent
description: Load an agent definition by name with hierarchical search (space â†’ global). Use this to inspect agent configurations, load sub-agents, or prepare agents for execution.

agent_name.description: Name, slug, or ID of the agent to load (e.g., "student_tutor", "education:tutor")

search_space.description: Whether to search in current space first (default: true)

search_global.description: Whether to search in global as fallback (default: true)

examples.scenario: Load an agent from space or global
examples.expected_result: Returns agent definition from space if exists, otherwise from global
Returns agent definition from global only
Returns agent definition from space only, ignoring global
